title: HPE security advisory (AV26-025)
description: On January 13, 2026, HPE published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products :
products: HPE Networking Instant  versions 3.3.1.0 and prior
HPE Aruba Networking AOS-8 and AOS-10 for Mobility Conductors, Controllers, and Gateways  multiple versions and platforms
HPE Aruba Networking Virtual Intranet Access (VIA) Client for Linux  versions 4.7.5 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
